TopicTitle: C# Plugin for a Radio Station Mod

Articles.Content:
Good morning everyone,

I'm hoping to get some help on how I would accomplish the following mod idea:

Essentially, you'd have a part that you'd fly out to somewhere in the Kerbol system that would broadcast music (playlist created from a folder within the mod that contains various audio files) at differing strengths (volume level) based on distance from the transmitter. You could also add another part to increase the transmitter power and increase the range that the audio is at an acceptable level.
